channel.title: Jar'ing a client
channel.description:
Title says it all. I need some help jar'ing my 712 client for my server. Basically i just lost about 30 players yesterday because it wasn't jar'ed and I didn't have a webclient. Will REP++. I've tried 20-30 different ways of jar'ing the client but no success on any of them obviously. Please help, mopar c:
If you need to add me on skype and whatnot my skype name is bi0haz4rd1
